abstract: Russian police arrest Oleg Belov, accused of killing and dismembering his mother, wife and six children in town near Moscow; Belov is wounded by police gunfire during capture.
lead_paragraph: Oleg Belov is suspected of killing and dismembering his six young children, his wife and his mother.

headline.main: Russia: Man Is Accused of Killing and Dismembering His Six Children
headline.print_headline: Europe; Russia: Man Is Accused of Killing and Dismembering His Six Children

snippet: Oleg Belov is suspected of killing and dismembering his six young children, his wife and his mother.
